name: Portfolio Website
description: This is my portfolio website created using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It's responsive and utilizes Bootstrap for design.

name: Task Management App
description: A task management application built with React and Redux. Users can create, edit, and delete tasks, and the app stores data in the cloud.

name: E-commerce Platform
description: An e-commerce platform developed using Django and React. It supports product listings, user accounts, and secure payment processing.

name: Blog Website
description: A blog website built with Node.js and Express. Users can create, edit, and delete blog posts, and the website includes user authentication.

name: Weather App
description: A weather application created with Vue.js. Users can check the current weather conditions and forecasts for different locations.

name: Recipe Book
description: A recipe book web application built with Angular. Users can browse and save recipes, and the app includes features for meal planning.

name: Recipe Book
description: A recipe book web application built with Angular. Users can browse and save recipes, and the app includes features for meal planning.
